<br>

#### Our data source was documents from the **Smartbook for DA Pam 600-3 Officer Professional Development and Career Management**. 

These documents spanned 11 Army Operations branches and 3 Information Dominance branches. In these documents, the desired attributes were presented in one of three ways: text form, a tabular layout, or with a flowchart.

Below are examples of each type of presentation with the desired information for our analysis highlighted.
